mapper.insert: insert into report (user_id, report_code, report_name, report_context, deadline_time, create_time, update_time) values ( #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportContext, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deadlineTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update report set deleted = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from report where id = #{reportId} and deleted = 0
